extendedInfo.description: You can help ADW and LauncherPro theme developers by installing this simple app.  It scans the apps on your phone and anonymously sends that data to be added to a database so that theme developers can easily get the information they need when making icon packs.You can see the result of this project at http://activities.droidicon.comThe information that is sent looks like this:MapsLatitudecom.google.android.apps.mapscom.google.android.maps.LatitudeActivityWhat theme developers get out of it is a fast, searchable database.  When they make an icon for your favorite app (the one you've been waiting for since you installed their theme), instead of jumping through hoops to find the right name for the image file, they just go to the web site, search for the name of the app, and find the correct name for the icon e.g. com_google_android_maps_latitudeactivity.png

reviews.title: I\'ve seen no results
reviews.comment: The Android world is mostly populated by irresponsible amateurs. Will it ever get better?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nedda be improved
reviews.comment: Once I launch the app, I don\'t know when the process will finish. It will be great if there is a progress bar or pop up notification when finish. Sometimes I can\'t find the activity name on the site after opening the app for two days
reviews.author: Ringo Chan

reviews.title: Pointless
reviews.comment: I have installed and run a number of times in recent months yet there are a number of apps I have that never appear on the activities list on the website. Emailed developer and no response. Waste of time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic App
reviews.comment: I reviewed this a little while back but thought I would do an update... I have been using this app and site for around 6 months and it is invaluable for skinning, it has a few glitches where some apps don\'t seem to appear but it can generally be got around if you know what you are doing. I ask anyone requesting icons for my pack to install this app. while it would be nice to see what it is doing it does the job nicely.  5 Stars
reviews.author: Michael Simmonds

reviews.title: Great idea - definitely needed!
reviews.comment: This is a great application to help the people who aren\'t lazy (i.e. not me) create great themes for all of us! Kudos to Jon for creating this and sharing the results openly with everybody, all for free!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Too Useful
reviews.comment: Very good for theme designers. Saves so much time and gets the less desirable part of theme making out of the way.
reviews.author: Christopher Jeffryes

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: How long should it take between installing and apps appearing on the site?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: @Avi email me the package names of the apps you want removed. I\'ll take them out and block them server side until I can make an in-app option.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: To everyone that downloads this app, thank you! - themers

reviews.comment: Very cool. Glad to help. The should explicitly say what it\'s doing. It just uploaded activities without confirming. I have apps I don\'t want listed.

reviews.comment: This should be an wonderful app to help out our much appreciated android themers

reviews.title: The best icons
reviews.comment: Please make icons for: Copy & Paste, Screen Shot, Back Call, Return Call, Profiles, Real Estate, Science, Evolution, Atheist.   Thank you for your excellent work!  Moyocoyatzin

reviews.title: Thank you!
reviews.comment: Thank you so much for this service. As a themer your website is absolutely amazing! I can\'t see why there\'s people out there complaining. Make your own website instead...
